hero.specialization: Frontend Developer specialized in JavaScript frameworks
hero.tagline: Transforming ideas into exceptional digital experiences

about.intro: I'm Ricardo Camilo, a frontend developer passionate about creating memorable digital experiences. üöÄ
about.description: As a developer with an investigative profile (93%), my approach combines technical precision with creativity. I believe that each line of code is an opportunity to create something extraordinary, transforming ideas into interfaces that delight and make people's lives easier. ‚ú®
about.education: Graduated in Information Technology Management from FATEC, I found my true calling in frontend programming. With 4 years of experience, I specialize in React.js and Vue.js, always seeking best practices and innovative solutions. üíª
about.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you'll find me immersed in Chinese novels, manga, or accompanied by my five cats, seeking inspiration to bring even more creativity to my projects. üìöüê±
about.bruceQuote: "Be water, my friend. Empty your mind. Be formless, shapeless, like water. When you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. When you put water into a bottle, it becomes the bottle. When you put water into a teapot, it becomes the teapot. Water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend." - Bruce Lee üåä

bitOfMe.reading: I'm an avid reader of Chinese novels and manga, immersing myself in fantastic worlds that expand my creativity.
bitOfMe.movies: Passionate about science fiction, I find inspiration for innovation through movies and series that explore the limits of technology and imagination.
bitOfMe.cats: I have five cats: Hercules, Johan, Lady, Princesa, and Aladin. Each with their unique personality, bringing joy and companionship to my daily life.
bitOfMe.programming: As a developer, I find in programming a way to create digital experiences as fascinating as the stories I read.
bitOfMe.relaxing: In my spare time, I like to relax with my cats, a good Chinese novel, and a cup of coffee, balancing the technical world with moments of tranquility.
bitOfMe.gaming: An appreciator of well-constructed narratives, whether in books, manga, or games, always seeking stories that inspire me both personally and professionally.

journey.title: About my Chronicles
journey.description: I'm a Frontend developer with 4 years of experience, currently based in S√£o Paulo, Brazil. My journey began after graduating in Information Technology Management from FATEC, where I discovered my passion for creating interfaces that impact people's lives. I started developing with Vue.js, moved to React, and various other JavaScript frameworks, and today I'm proud to master multiple modern frameworks that allow me to create robust and scalable solutions.
journey.approach: I approach each project with a meticulous and strategic eye. I'm especially dedicated to creating clean and optimized code, always seeking the best development practices.

funFact.label: Fun fact:
funFact.description: As a results-oriented developer (according to behavioral profile), I'm always studying new technologies. Currently, I'm deepening my knowledge in Node.js, seeking to expand my technical capabilities even further.

journey.conclusion: I believe that a developer's true value lies not just in the code I write, but in the ability to make it elegant and easy to maintain.

work.title: Featured Projects
work.description: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and experience.

breathNatural.name: ü™¥ Breath Natural - NextJS
breathNatural.description: Application developed as part of NextJS Chronicles, demonstrating how a mockup can be expanded into a potential e-commerce and become more attractive with animations and interactions.

foodHut.name: üçΩÔ∏è Food Hut - AngularJS
foodHut.description: Project developed as part of Angular Chronicles, focused on demonstrating frontend development best practices with Angular. Implements a food ordering system with a responsive and modern interface.

testimonial1.name: Ricardo Camilo
testimonial1.testimonial: "As a frontend developer with 4 years of experience, I'm passionate about transforming ideas into exceptional interfaces. My methodical approach and attention to detail have allowed me to achieve significant results, such as in the TippBank project, where I managed to reduce loading time by 40% through performance optimizations. Every line of code I write reflects my commitment to excellence and user experience."

testimonial2.name: Ricardo Camilo
testimonial2.testimonial: "As the founder of Abyss Tech, I lead projects that go beyond interface development - we create memorable experiences. My expertise in Vue.js and React.js allows me to transform visions into digital reality. I'm proud to say that my commitment to clean code and performance has already impacted thousands of users, especially on the Loor.vc platform, one of our success cases."

testimonial3.name: Ricardo Camilo
testimonial3.testimonial: "I stay constantly updated with technological evolutions and growing user expectations. As a developer, I bring to each project a unique combination of technical experience and strategic vision. Whether developing a high-impact landing page or a complex e-commerce, my focus is on delivering not just code, but results that truly drive business."
